author: taylor
msg: JS2-1300: delete user preferences when deleting a user

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-4184][UIMA-4187] fix IntHashSet for 2byte negative values, and to not expand when checking for contains, etc.

author: lucastheisen
msg: - Updated CreateLdapConnectionPool annotation and CreateLdapConnectionPoolRule to support different pool implementations
- Removed redundant unit test from PasswordPolicyIT that was flaky due to Thread.sleep() race conditions
- Updated LdapApiIntegrationUtils to use DefaultLdapConnectionPool because it casts the returned connection to LdapNetworkConnection which does not work if the connection is wrapped

author: lucastheisen
msg: - Rewrote Oid to clean up code, better document, and clear up the public interface
- Only rebind as necessary (if bind/starttls was called on connection)
- Move more common functionality to AbstractPoolableLdapConnectionFactory
- Move more common functionality to AbstractPoolableLdapConnectionFactory
- Added LdapConnectionWrapper to allow for easier wrapping of LdapConnection classes

author: justin
msg: SLING-4311 - edge case where reusing an hidden ancestor name caused the wrong resource to be hidden
